name: Empires of Sorcery
blurb: A turn-based 4X strategy game for PC with elements of fantasy, magic, city management, and tactical combat.

rewards.reward: No Reward
Our sincere thanks, expressed in a personal email from the development team. All backers get access to exclusive forums where you can give us feedback about the game both before and after launch.
Beta access to Empires of Sorcery during the development process. All Beta testers will receive a mention in the final credits of the game.
A digital download of the finished game, as well as previous rewards.
Your name (or a name of your choice) in the game as the name of a city, magical item, or some other named entity. Also a letter of appreciation signed by the developers, as well as previous rewards.

Beta access not only for Empires of Sorcery but also for future Lucid Dreamers developments. Get an early look at everything we do, and help us make all our games better! Additionally, you will have editorial access to the Empires of Sorcery wiki page, as well as previous rewards. This is your chance to share your gaming expertise with the rest of the world!
For those who prefer something they can hold in their hands, a physical copy of the game on disc, as well as previous rewards.
A custom mouse pad featuring artwork from the game, as well as previous rewards.
A digital media package including wallpapers, concept art, screenshots, notes and video clips of the design and development process, as well as previous rewards.

Help us design a major magical item to be included in the game. We'll work with you to give it a name, stats and spooky powers, even design custom artwork. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous rewards.
An Empires of Sorcery poster featuring artwork from the game, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Not only will you receive the full game at release, but also as we continue to develop Empires of Sorcery into the future, you will get any updates and expansion packs for free too, as well as previous unlimited rewards.
An Empires of Sorcery collector's coin, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Help us design an artifact level magical item to be included in the game, an object of phenomenal power to be wielded by your heroes. We'll work with you to give it a name, stats and even more spooky powers, and design custom artwork for your item. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.
An Empires of Sorcery T-shirt featuring artwork from the game, as well as previous unlimited rewards.
All  the unlimited rewards from previous tiers, with all physical items signed or initialed by the developers if you so desire.

Early Bird Special: Design a Hero who will appear in the game. We will work with you to give him or her a name, stats, special abilities and a custom portrait. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Early Bird Special: Design a Champion, an extremely powerful hero who will appear in the game. We will work with you to give him or her a name, stats, special abilities and a custom portrait. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.
A tweet-length personal message in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.
Your name and image (or a name and image of your design) on one of the game's AI opponents, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Early Bird Special: Design a custom monster which will appear rampaging across the countryside or guarding a dungeon. We will work with you to give it a name, stats, special abilities and custom artwork. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Design a Hero who will appear in the game. We will work with you to give him or her a name, stats, special abilities and a custom portrait. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Design a Champion, an extremely powerful hero who will appear in the game. We will work with you to give him or her a name, stats, special abilities and a custom portrait. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Design a custom monster which will appear rampaging across the countryside or guarding a dungeon. We will work with you to give it a name, stats, special abilities and custom artwork. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.
Work with us to design an AI opponent, including name, portrait, powers and play style. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Work with us to design an inspirational structure for one of the races in the game. This structure will be built in the cities of that race, as a statue or monument, for example, and will provide a bonus to some aspect of city management. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Work with us to design a wonder of the world which will appear on the game map. This structure can be captured and held by a player or AI opponent and will provide a bonus to some aspect of kingdom management. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Add your own custom easter egg to the game. Within reasonable limits, we'll let you add almost anything you like, to be unlocked by whatever bizarre concatenation of circumstances you choose (again, reasonable limits). You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.

Work with us to design a custom playable race. We plan to launch with at least 5 playable races, each with their own custom artwork, military units, buildings, etc., but we would love to be able to add more. This level of support will allow you a huge amount of creative input into one of the fundamental aspects of Empires of Sorcery, making it a better game for everyone, and earning yourself considerable bragging rights. You'll also get a special mention in the final credits, as well as previous unlimited rewards.
